comments: Complement of A138235; a(n)=A138236(A138235(n)) and A138236(a(n))=A138235(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 07 2008Numbers k such that A248515(k+1) = A248515(k) + 1 = 1 + least number h such that 1 - h*sin(1/h) < 1/n^2. The difference sequence of A248515 is (0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0,...), so that A138235 = (1,3,5,6,8,...) and A022840 = (2, 4, 7, 9, 12, 14,...). - _Clark Kimberling_, Jun 16 2015

prog: (Haskell)a022840 = floor . (* sqrt 6) . fromIntegral-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 14 2014(MAGMA) [Floor(n*Sqrt(6)): n in [1..60]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 17 2015
